quote: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: It is up to each of us to sing as we feel moved by the overall song of life.
author: Ming-Dao Deng

quote: When it comes to mastering a skill, time is the magic ingredient.
author: Robert Greene

quote: Where violence reigns, reason is weak.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that things are difficult.
author: Seneca
